The asessment of national hygienic city has a comprehensive guideline on solid waste management, waste water management, coverage of green area and green area per capita, Air Pollution Index (API) or Air Quality index (AQI) and other seven items. Full guideline can be download from the website of [National Health Commisson of the People's Republic of China.](http://www.nhc.gov.cn/jkj/s5898/201509/a758669061fd469aa3a754c8781acae4.shtml).
